"}]}], "process_md": "**Step 1:** The interested applicant should visit (during office hours) the **Pondicherry Society for the care of the Aged (PONCARE), Puducherry, 4th Cross - Sithankudi, 6th Cross Extension, Brindavanam, West, Puducherry - 605 013, +91-413-2245317, +91-413-2246318, +91-9443405499**, and request the hard copy of the prescribed format of the application form from the staff exclusively entrusted to issue and collect filled-in applications. \n**Step 2:** In the application form, fill in all the mandatory fields, paste the passport-sized photograph (signed across, if required), and attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attest, if required). \n**Step 3:** Submit the duly filled and signed application form along with the documents to The Secretary, PONCARE.
